channel.title: Why the MESG Token
channel.description:
The goal of this article is to describe the utility of the MESG and what it means for you if you already have some now.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/p/de879b35-0da6-4f31-bd23-9bdc6c95c88c/
